name: Merrell Zion Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Men's
description: Light hiking shoes built on the same platform as trail running shoes. They're supportive enough for carrying heavy loads, yet light enough for fast-and-light outings. Breathable mesh and full-grain leather withstand harsh terrain without weighing you down. M Select Dry membrane keeps your feet dry on wet trails or stream crossings.Durable full-grain leather and mesh upper offers breathable comfort.M-Select Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry.Bellows tongue keeps debris out.EVA midsole with dual-density EVA heel and forefoot inserts absorb shocks and stabilize your foot.Lightweight FlexPlate provides torsional rigidity on uneven terrain.Vibram MegaGrip rubber outsole with 5mm lugs grip wet or dry surfaces.
